components.name: eucanetd
components.description: Used to track component level items associated with Edge.

fields.description:
Current VPCMIDO metadata network path involves:
- a network namespace on CLC for each VPC
- an nginx instance on CLC for each VPC
- 2 veth network interface pair on CLC for each VPC subnet

It is desirable to eliminate the need for artifacts external to MidoNet (e.g., nginx, network namespaces) on a per-VPC or per-VPC-subnet basis.
This story covers investigations and experiments to design an alternative metadata network path.
fields.summary: eucanetd: VPCMIDO: investigate alternative implementations to metadata network path
VPCMIDO driver code cleanup in preparation to metadata network path investigations

comments.body:
With this patch, eucanetd 4.4 metadata network path is created in MidoNet.
Current implementation requires a single nginx instance running on CLC. Moving forward, changes in CLC and metadata server can remove this nginx dependency.

Expect only 1 master nginx process instead of number of VPCs + 1 master nginx processes.
This changes instance metadata networking, so tests that stresses the use of metadata server is required. Since tests involve creation of instances with cloud-init, possibly the regression tests are sufficient.
Moving 4.4.0 Issues from Release Pending to Resolved
